turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: "I'll Stand by You" is a cover in 2010 by the Colombian singer Shakira as a promotional charity single for the Hope for Haiti Now campaign and was released on 23 January 2010, in the wake of the devastating 2010 Haiti earthquake.
turn.6: Recorded live on the charity telethon "" on January 22, 2010 in New York City.
turn.8: She performed the song during the program, exactly before Wyclef Jean's speech and after Reese Witherspoon's call on the phone bank.
turn.9: Was it included on an album?
turn.10: The song is found on the charity benefit album, "Hope for Haiti Now".
turn.12: Album version Patti LaBelle covered the song for her 2005 album "Classic Moments".
